name: The Dark Forest (Watermagle)
description:
Silence isn't empty, it's full of answers

The Dark Forest is a real-time strategy game in which you take on the role of artificial intelligence in an inhospitable galaxy. All forms of communication, from radio signals to gravitational waves, catch only one thing - silence. What is the true nature of this phenomenon is for you to find out personally. Explore, build, fight and plan your expansion carefully in the cruel world of The Dark Forest.
